main.name: Camin McCluskey
main.description: Currently working at Skyscanner London and co-founder at inHouse
main.bio: Graduated with First Class Honours in Management from the London School of Economics including a full scholarship year abroad at the University of California, Berkeley to study Computer Science and Machine Learning. Interested in Start-ups, Venture Capital, and Consulting within in the technology sector. I have a particular interest in SaaS businesses leveraging Artificial Intelligence insights.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
